activities: Marketing research - we interview residents of the EU via -person interviews, phone-web based interviews, telephone interviews and research surveys to get feedback on product and service offerings for our research clients.  For some projects, we may collect personal information, limited to name, e-mail address, mailing address and telephone number.  We do not disclose this information to any third parties; we use this information solely for contacting research participants and for paying them research incentives, when applicable, and we delete / destroy records containing this information at the conclusion of each project.
eucountries: Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom
personaldata: Manually Processed Data, Data Received via Email or web download from EU Partners
